channel.title: Security Business Terrorism on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Security Business Terrorism on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Hehe...
item.description: So SmartFilter is apparently blocking my site nata2.org. My friend sent me this message: This site (http://www.nata2.org/) is categorized as: ‘Crim. Skills’ and has been blocked by SmartFilter. Please contact Data Security at xxx-xxx-xxxx if you have a business need to access this site.I am such a criminal. If you want to know how to make a bong, or how to make pepper spray, or kill your parents, or how to make a bomb.
